items.summary: Create a new page component at frontend/src/pages/SubjectToCareer.tsx that displays the Subject-to-Career AR Explorer module content with a header, description explaining how subjects connect to career paths, and placeholder content indicating AR features are coming soon

Add a new route for '/subject-to-career' in frontend/src/App.tsx that renders the SubjectToCareer page component, ensuring it follows the same routing pattern as existing module routes like '/career-path', '/stream-selector', and '/chatbot'

Update frontend/src/pages/Modules.tsx to ensure the 'Subject-to-Career AR Explorer' module card has the correct path='/subject-to-career' in its ModuleCard component, matching the pattern used by other module cards
